channel.title: hugo on sarah.engineer
channel.description: Recent content in hugo on sarah.engineer

item.title: New Website
item.description: I decided to finally build a new website, using Hugo. I have this tendency to fall down absurd rabbitholes while working on projects like this. In this case, it involved making the home page of my website contain a (very rough draft of a) POSIX-like shell. Check it out if you’re a nerd like me! Just press ‘enter’ on the main page to activate it. How it’s Built The crux of this shell is bash-parser, a repository I stumbled across on GitHub.
